content.p: Consider two notes that are played at the same time. The first note has a frequency of [[f1]] \mathrm{ Hz}; the second has a frequency of [[f2]] \mathrm{ Hz}. What is the beat frequency, in \mathrm{ Hz}, of the resultant wave?
The formula for the beat frequency of two interfering waves is \text{beat frequency} = 2 \Delta f
